name: christmas bunting sweater
sizes_available: the sweaters are approximately 26cm wide (cuff to cuff) and 16cm high.
notes:
the sweater is designed to hang on a cord to make christmas bunting, but it can also be used to make christmas tree ornaments or to dress toys with. 

my knitting group was tasked to make christmas buntings to hang in our local shop windows.

i wanted to knit a row of little sweaters, but the patterns i found were quite small and i doubted they would be visible to passersby, plus i needed a design that would hang nicely from the curved bunting cord. i couldnâ€™t find exactly what i needed, and with inspiration from sue stratford's mini christmas jumper bunting, i wrote this pattern.  

it is knitted in one piece, and by finishing off with kitchener stitch or a 3 needle bind off, there are no seams to sew up - that's right - no seams to sew up.

the pattern is free, so why not download it and have some fun knitting a couple (or more) sweaters for yourself or a friend.
